And when “Big Data” was just emerging as a hot industry trend, our teams already had been deploying Hadoop in \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expedia\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#303240\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Paypal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#303240\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Soon, it led to the creation of the Competency Center focused on Big Data and Data Science, which has greatly contributed to the development of the entire practice since then.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2017, the business units\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Big Data and DWBI\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#303240\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence) merged into a single practice. In many ways it was a response to the heightened demand on the market, where more and more projects required joint data teams that could bring diverse set of skills on a project. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New, interesting cases were filled with complex challenges connected with \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Solution Architecture\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#303240\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Gothic Light\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"major-fareast\",\"color\":\"#303240\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; it became clear that the growing practice also needed DevOps specialists who possess the knowledge of all the technologies in the practice portfolio. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Demand for people who could build effective two-way communication between a client and a development team, check the data provided, interview clients and guide them was also increasing dramatically.
